snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 462: Sonic 360º (SAGE2004)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic 360º - SAGE2004
Credit: Nitemare (360 Productions)
Release Date: September 9th, 2004

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Boot
00:16 - Title&Stuff
01:36 - Hydrocity Zone Act 1
07:05 - Hydrocity Zone Act 2 & Boss

NOTES: AH YES back to good old SAGE2004... It is one of my fav ones...
ANYWAY here we have a game from the past by Nitemare.
WHAT!? He was involved in something other and not just XG!?
Yes yes yes crazy I know but that's not important here.
What is important however is we get to play the imfamous Chao Online from the past.
I'm sure only the oldest of fangame fans remember that one... And here it is working fi-...owait...
Never mind, it's just a feature to transfer over Rings to it, hooray for cross fangame compatibility!
But it's dead so sadness overwhelmage.
So what about the rest of the game? Well we got 3 WHOLE ZONES! And by 3 i mean only 1.
A two Act trip through Hydrocity as Advance Sonic who cannot hit the breaks nor go into ball for to save his own life.
Unless he is idle...
The gameplay physics for this old Demo have not aged too well as you can barely jump over certain spikes or onto ledges.
But visually or music wise can't say anything bad, but speaking of Music... That Boss theme... Using one of my fav tracks from like 24 years ago huh...
I see how it is... Trying to get bonus review points from me in 2023 from all the way back from 2004 huh darn you Nitemare you win this round...
With all that said and done this game did get a supposed remaster/reboot but outside of Screenshots I'm not sure if anything playable was released.

(ISSUES)

1. Application reset music keeps playing.
2. Online Service no longer available.
